topic.title: Free Google AI and Drive for students
topic.text:
https://blog.google/products/gemini/google-one-ai-premium-students-free/?utm_source=kw-newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=04182025&utm_content=cta

Check out this. East way to get free google drive space for students. 2tb. Will make the export to drive much easier. Also comes with free google ai
